spell.name: Acid Pike

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the reach property

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a melee attack with it. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and acid splashes from your weapon and creates a pool of 5 feet diameter on the ground beneath the creature's feet. The pool of acid lasts for the spell's duration, and any creature that end its turn in that pool takes {@damage 1d8} acid damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} acid damage to the target on a hit, and the damage a target takes from ending its turn in the acid pool increases to {@dice 2d8}. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8} and {@dice 3d8}) and again at 17th level ({@dice 3d8} and {@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Burning Trap

m.text: a hunting trap or a bag of caltrops worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the hunting trap or a bag of caltrops used in the spell’s casting and set it on the ground within 5 feet of you. The next creature that triggers the trap or walks on the caltrops suffers the normal effects of them, and then takes {@damage 1d4} fire damage on the start of each of its turns. The spell ends after 1 minute or when the creature is freed from your hunting trap or is healed from the caltrops wounds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the fire damage increases to {@dice 2d4}. That damage roll also increases by {@dice 1d4} at 11th level ({@dice 3d4}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).

spell.name: Corrosive Net

m.text: a net worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the net used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects, and the first time it is hit by an attack each round, it takes an extra acid damage equal to your spellcasting modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the acid damage increases to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier. That damage roll increases by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level ({@dice 2d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d6}).

spell.name: Dark Cleave

m.text: a melee two handed weapon or a versatile weapon wielded with two hands, worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and if your current Hit Points are lower than half your Maximum Hit Points, the creature takes extra necrotic damage equal to your spellcasting modifier as a black and corrosive liquid covers your weapon.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the weapon attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage to the target on a hit, and the extra necrotic damage increases to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level ({@dice 2d6} and {@dice 2d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d6} and {@dice 3d6}).

spell.name: Electrified Net

m.text: a net worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the net used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the attack’s normal effects, and every time it makes an ability check or an attack roll to free himself from the net, it takes {@damage 2d8} lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the lightning damage increases to {@dice 3d8}. That damage roll increases by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 4d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 5d8}).

spell.name: Explosive Trap

m.text: a hunting trap or a bag of caltrops worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the hunting trap or a bag of caltrops used in the spell’s casting and set it on the ground within 5 feet of you. The next creature that triggers the trap or walks on the caltrops suffers the normal effects of them, and takes an extra {@damage 1d8} thunder damage. Each other creature within 5 feet of the trap when it is triggered also takes {@damage 1d8} thunder damage. The spell then ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the thunder damage increases to {@dice 2d8}. That damage roll also increases by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 3d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

spell.name: Force Cleave

m.text: a melee two handed weapon or a versatile weapon wielded with two hands, worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and takes an extra force damage equal to your spellcasting modifier if its movement speed is currently reduced by any effect (the creature is {@condition prone}, is in a difficult terrain, or suffers the effects of a spell that reduces its movement speed for instance).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the weapon attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} force damage to the target on a hit, and the extra force damage increases to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level ({@dice 2d6} and {@dice 2d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d6} and {@dice 3d6}).

spell.name: Frosted Arrow

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a ranged attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and its movement speed is reduced by 10ft. for the duration of the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage to the target on a hit. That damage roll increases by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

spell.name: Ice Strike

m.text: a one handed melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. A fine layer of ice covers your weapon. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and its movement speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} cold damage to the target on a hit. That damage roll increases by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

spell.name: Light Strike

m.text: (a one handed melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and if your current Hit Points are equal to your Maximum Hit Points, the creature takes extra damage equal to your spellcasting modifier. Moreover, your weapon shines and sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the weapon attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} radiant damage to the target on a hit, and the extra radiant damage increases to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level ({@dice 2d6} and {@dice 2d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d6} and {@dice 3d6}).

spell.name: Lightning Throw

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the Thrown property

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a ranged attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and the weapon returns to your hand, crackling with lightnings, and you can cause the lightnings to leap to an other creature within 10 feet of you. The second creature takes lightning damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} lightning damage to the target on a hit, and the lightning damage to the second creature increases to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8} and {@dice 2d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d8} and {@dice 3d8}).

spell.name: Poisonous Shield

m.text: a shield worth at least 1 sp

entries: Poisonous spikes grow all over your shield for the duration of the spell, and every time a creature targets you with a melee attack, it takes poison damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the poison damage increases to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting modifier. That damage roll increases by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level ({@dice 2d6}) and again at 17th level ({@dice 3d6}).

spell.name: Ravenous Throw

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the Thrown property

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a ranged attack with it against a creature that is at least 10 feet from you. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and a dark energy gnaws the creature's defenses. The next time the creature is hit by a melee weapon attack, it takes extra {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage to the target on a hit, and the necrotic damage from the melee weapon attack increases to {@dice 2d6}. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level ({@dice 2d6} and {@dice 3d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d6} and {@dice 4d6}).

spell.name: Resonant Shield

m.text: a shield worth at least 1 sp

entries: You gain the same benefits as if you used the Dodge action. Moreover, the next creature that hits you with a melee attack while this spell is active must succeed on a strength saving throw or take force damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier, be pushed 5 feet from you, and be knocked {@condition prone}. Once a creature has hit you, the spell ends (and you no longer benefit from the advantages of the Dodge action).

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the force damage increases to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. That damage roll increases again by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8}) and once again at 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

spell.name: Sedative Sting

m.text: a dart or a blowgun, worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and takes an extra {@damage 1d6} psychic damage. Moreover, if the creature is raging or {@status Concentration|XPHB|Concentrating} on a spell at the end of its next turn, it takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the weapon attack extra psychic damage increases to {@dice 2d6}, and the psychic damage the target takes if it is raging or {@status Concentration|XPHB|Concentrating} increases to {@dice 3d6}. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d6} at 11th level ({@dice 3d6} and {@dice 4d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d6} and {@dice 5d6}).

spell.name: Shining Arrow

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a ranged attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and you can cause the light to pierce through the creature and hit a second creature on a same line and within 15 feet of the first one. The second creature takes radiant damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the ranged attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} radiant damage to the target on a hit, and the radiant damage to the second creature increases to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8} and {@dice 2d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d8} and {@dice 3d8}).

spell.name: Tormenting Pike

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the reach property

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make a melee attack with it. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and the first time it attacks a creature other than you before the spell ends, it takes psychic damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra {@damage 1d8} psychic damage to the target on a hit, and the damage the target takes if it attacks a creature other than you increases to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting modifier. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8} and {@dice 2d8}) and again at 17th level ({@dice 3d8} and {@dice 3d8}).

spell.name: Venomous Sting

m.text: a dart or a blowgun, worth at least 1 sp

entries: You brandish the weapon used in the spell’s casting and make an attack with it against a creature. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack’s normal effects, and takes an extra {@damage 1d8} poison damage. Moreover, if the creature suffers currently from the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition, it takes an other {@damage 2d8} poison damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Cantrip Upgrade
entries: At 5th level, the weapon attack extra poison damage increases to {@dice 2d8}, and the extra poison damage if the creature is {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} increases to {@dice 3d8}. Both damage rolls increase by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 3d8} and {@dice 4d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d8} and {@dice 5d8}).
